
---
title: 'AF 浏览器收藏扩展 0.7.1 地址栏搜索'
categories: 
 - 编程
 - 开源中国
 - 资讯
headimg: 'https://af.newbe.pro/zh-Hans/assets/images/20211107-001-37c15086b8bbab8f83a76dc2aa60eaff.gif'
author: 开源中国
comments: false
date: Mon, 08 Nov 2021 09:56:00 GMT
thumbnail: 'https://af.newbe.pro/zh-Hans/assets/images/20211107-001-37c15086b8bbab8f83a76dc2aa60eaff.gif'
---

<div>   
<div class="content">
                                                                                            <h2 style="text-align:start">v0.7.1<a href="https://www.oschina.net/action/GoToLink?url=https%3A%2F%2Faf.newbe.pro%2Fzh-Hans%2Fdocs%2F99-1-Whats-New%23v071" target="_blank">​</a></h2> 
<p style="color:#1c1e21; text-align:start">此版本，我们带来了更加便捷的地址栏搜索和历史记录功能。</p> 
<h3 style="text-align:start">⚙ 功能性<a href="https://www.oschina.net/action/GoToLink?url=https%3A%2F%2Faf.newbe.pro%2Fzh-Hans%2Fdocs%2F99-1-Whats-New%23-%25E5%258A%259F%25E8%2583%25BD%25E6%2580%25A7" target="_blank">​</a></h3> 
<h4 style="text-align:start">地址栏搜索<a href="https://www.oschina.net/action/GoToLink?url=https%3A%2F%2Faf.newbe.pro%2Fzh-Hans%2Fdocs%2F99-1-Whats-New%23%25E5%259C%25B0%25E5%259D%2580%25E6%25A0%258F%25E6%2590%259C%25E7%25B4%25A2" target="_blank">​</a></h4> 
<p style="color:#1c1e21; text-align:start">除了支持在管理界面进行搜索之外，现在也支持在地址栏进行搜索。</p> 
<p style="color:#1c1e21; text-align:start">只要在地址栏输入<span> </span><code>af</code>+<code>space</code>，那么就会进入搜索模式，效果如下所示：</p> 
<p style="color:#1c1e21; text-align:start"><img alt="omnibox 搜索" src="https://af.newbe.pro/zh-Hans/assets/images/20211107-001-37c15086b8bbab8f83a76dc2aa60eaff.gif" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p> 
<p style="color:#1c1e21; text-align:start">你可以通过控制面板来来设置该功能的的相关细节。</p> 
<p style="color:#1c1e21; text-align:start"><img alt="omnibox 设置" src="https://af.newbe.pro/zh-Hans/assets/images/20211107-002-9b36f36911724e1fca0efd927c5bceb8.png" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p> 
<h4 style="text-align:start">历史记录<a href="https://www.oschina.net/action/GoToLink?url=https%3A%2F%2Faf.newbe.pro%2Fzh-Hans%2Fdocs%2F99-1-Whats-New%23%25E5%258E%2586%25E5%258F%25B2%25E8%25AE%25B0%25E5%25BD%2595" target="_blank">​</a></h4> 
<p style="color:#1c1e21; text-align:start">你可以点击此按钮，查看最近点击访问过的书签。</p> 
<p style="color:#1c1e21; text-align:start"><img alt="History button" src="data:image/png;base64," referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p> 
<p style="color:#1c1e21; text-align:start"><img alt="History" src="https://af.newbe.pro/zh-Hans/assets/images/20211107-004-27d3b883cc64396e9bde90bbfc42c411.png" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p> 
<h4 style="text-align:start">编辑时共享<a href="https://www.oschina.net/action/GoToLink?url=https%3A%2F%2Faf.newbe.pro%2Fzh-Hans%2Fdocs%2F99-1-Whats-New%23%25E7%25BC%2596%25E8%25BE%2591%25E6%2597%25B6%25E5%2585%25B1%25E4%25BA%25AB" target="_blank">​</a></h4> 
<p style="color:#1c1e21; text-align:start">现在，在编辑框中也可以直接进行分享。</p> 
<p style="color:#1c1e21; text-align:start"><img alt="Sharing button" src="https://af.newbe.pro/zh-Hans/assets/images/20211107-005-8856389626f63310e3acc1265f71aa98.png" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p> 
<h4 style="text-align:start">开发时固定扩展ID<a href="https://www.oschina.net/action/GoToLink?url=https%3A%2F%2Faf.newbe.pro%2Fzh-Hans%2Fdocs%2F99-1-Whats-New%23%25E5%25BC%2580%25E5%258F%2591%25E6%2597%25B6%25E5%259B%25BA%25E5%25AE%259A%25E6%2589%25A9%25E5%25B1%2595id" target="_blank">​</a></h4> 
<p style="color:#1c1e21; text-align:start">现在，开发阶段的扩展ID已经被固定为 podhpclhgkdeiechkdceginfehfanhcb。</p> 
<p style="color:#1c1e21; text-align:start">因此，即使你是用解压包安装，那么ID每次都是相同的。</p> 
<div style="text-align:start"> 
 <h3 style="margin-left:0; margin-right:0">软件简介</h3> 
</div> 
<div style="text-align:start"> 
 <div style="text-align:left"> 
  <p style="margin-left:0; margin-right:0">Amazing Favorites 是一款采用 Blazor 技术开发的 Chromium 内核的浏览器插件，因此，其可以被安装到 Chrome / Microsoft Edge / 360 极速浏览器 / Vivaldi / 搜狗高速浏览器 等浏览器之上。<br> 它可以帮助使用者高效的管理和搜索自己的收藏夹，为此增加了一些增强功能：</p> 
  <ul style="list-style-type:disc; margin-left:0; margin-right:0"> 
   <li>支持为链接标记 tag，从而为通过 tag 为链接进行交叉分组</li> 
   <li>支持快捷键操作</li> 
  </ul> 
  <p style="margin-left:0; margin-right:0">您可以通过下方链接来快速了解功能。</p> 
  <p style="margin-left:0; margin-right:0">欢迎使用：<a href="https://www.oschina.net/action/GoToLink?url=https%3A%2F%2Faf.newbe.pro%2Fzh-Hans%2Fdocs%2F99-0-Welcome" target="_blank">https://af.newbe.pro/zh-Hans/docs/99-0-Welcome</a></p> 
  <p style="margin-left:0; margin-right:0"><img alt src="https://oscimg.oschina.net/oscnet/up-29680d5ddb2078ddcb686dd48e24b4eab5b.gif" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p> 
  <p style="margin-left:0; margin-right:0"><img alt height="500" src="https://oscimg.oschina.net/oscnet/up-72a8123a5561af03c0e7406462291c45d3d.gif" width="1220" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p> 
  <h3 style="margin-left:0; margin-right:0">软件下载与安装</h3> 
  <p style="margin-left:0; margin-right:0">您可以通过用户手册了解不同浏览器中的安装方式。</p> 
  <p style="margin-left:0; margin-right:0"><a href="https://www.oschina.net/action/GoToLink?url=https%3A%2F%2Faf.newbe.pro%2Fzh-Hans%2Fdocs%2F01-1-Install-Edge" target="_blank">https://af.newbe.pro/zh-Hans/docs/01-1-Install-Edge</a></p> 
  <p style="margin-left:0; margin-right:0"><a href="https://www.oschina.net/action/GoToLink?url=https%3A%2F%2Faf.newbe.pro%2Fzh-Hans%2Fdocs%2F01-0-Install-Chrome" target="_blank">https://af.newbe.pro/zh-Hans/docs/01-0-Install-Chrome</a></p> 
  <h3 style="margin-left:0; margin-right:0">扩展商城</h3> 
  <p style="margin-left:0; margin-right:0">Microsoft Edge Store</p>

  <p style="margin-left:0; margin-right:0">Chrome Extension Store</p> 
  <p style="margin-left:0; margin-right:0"><a href="https://www.oschina.net/action/GoToLink?url=https%3A%2F%2Fchrome.google.com%2Fwebstore%2Fdetail%2Famazing-favorites%2Fpodhpclhgkdeiechkdceginfehfanhcb" target="_blank">https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/amazing-favorites/podhpclhgkdeiechkdceginfehfanhcb</a></p> 
  <h3 style="margin-left:0; margin-right:0">我有新点子</h3>
